page.title: 05SIMISTER VILLAGE.
page.content: Simister is a village which although it is now set in an between the M62 and M66 motorways still manages to retain a unique rural atmosphere. During the last twenty years new homes have been built in the village, but many of the cottages which once housed farm labourers and silk weavers are now being modernised and becoming very desirable properties. Many of the villagers work in a wide variety of professions, but choose to live in Simister because of its rural atmosphere. The village has a church, one post office cum general store, one shop, andtwo public houses. Although there are few people left who have been "born and bred" in Simister the majority of villagers soon settle to village life and fiercely defend its quite life and atmosphere.
